sentences.english: There was little to see around the ancient road except yellow sand, withered grasses and the occasional crow flying homewards.

sentences.english: Thanks to kindhearted bus drivers that day, they did not go on strike.

sentences.english: Alone, I hurriedly followed an ancient path in farmlands to escape from the wilds.
